item.title: Group-robust Machine Unlearning
item.description: Group-robust machine unlearning via MIU reduces perf. degradation in dominant groups after unlearning, preserving model robustness without compromising accuracy.

item.title: NullFace: Training-Free Localized Face Anonymization
item.description: NullFace: A training-free face anonymization method preserving non-identity attributes with localized control using latent diffusion inversion.
